title: Mac - League Reinstalling???
body: Hello, I own a Mac laptop and today, when I tried to open the alpha client (I was hitting the button on dock), and it wouldn't open. I left, and came back and it just told me I had to reinstall, then started re-installing. Please help???

replies.body:
Did you let the reinstall go through? Try launching the League client from your **Applications folder** rather than from the Dock, as the dock has caused problems in the past for some players.

Let me know what you find.
It wouldn't open so I just ended up uninstalling then reinstalling altogether.
